text: The Toyota Aygo is a car made by the Japanese company Toyota in the Czech Republic since 2005. It has four seats and either two or four doors. The car has a 1-litre petrol or 1,4-litre diesel engine. The car is similar to the Peugeot 107 and CitroÃ«n C1. It entered its second generation in 2014. == Engines == * 1.0 VVT-i 50 kW (68 hp) * 1.4 D4-D 40 kW (54 hp) Aygo Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Toyota Aygo
